general_info_repo

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • general_info_repo.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class pretends to be the Game objets and will represent one match game, it will have trials, pontuation of the game by team, centre of the rope by game, and winners.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int id)
      The game id, is the number of game of the match.

        public void updateRope(java.lang.String team,
                       int strength)
        Update the center of the rope with the strength and team.
        Parameters:
        team - can be "A" or "B"
        strength - will be used to push the rope.

      • assertTrialDecision

        public int assertTrialDecision()
        This method will determine if one game is wonned by team A or B or if is a draw.
        Returns:
        decision, can be 2 (B), -2 (A) for knock outs; 0 for game finished with win or draw or 1 for new trial.
